name: Yahtzee Adventure
description:
The first ever game in the Yahtzee-like genre.

Short game where you use Yahtzee rules to defeat your enemies.

You have been captured by King Dice, the evil ruler of Dicetopia. Your objective is to get through his henchmen and stop King Dice once and for all.

Yahtzee Rules:

You roll 5 dices, 3 times total.

After every roll, you can decide to keep how many dices you want, and roll the rest of them.

When you attack, all your dices numbers are added up, and a special damage multiplier is added if you have special combinations of dice.

Combinations:

Pair: 2x damage

Three of a kind: 3x damage

Full House (a pair and three of a kind in one): 4x damage

Four of a kind: 4x damage

Yahtzee (Five of a kind): 7x damage

Small Straight (1, 2, 3 , 4, 5): x6 damage

Large Straight (2, 3, 4, 5, 6): x7 damage

All art, code, and music made by me.
